policies.name: AmazonEKSClusterPolicy
policies.description: Provides permissions for EKS cluster management

policies.name: AmazonEKSWorkerNodePolicy
policies.description: Provides permissions for EKS worker node management

policies.description: Provides permissions for EKS CNI (Container Network Interface) management

policies.description: Provides read-only access to Amazon ECR repositories

policies.description: Provides permissions for EKS VPC resource management
